title: When are you planning to write the ESAs?
content:
Especially final year students, now that they're online.

comments.body: Isa2 will be cancelled or no?
Maybe not, coz it's optional from the start
Didnâ€™t read the title properly... how to unvote?

End-Semester Assessments (ESAs) are the final graded examinations held at the end of each semester. They usually carry half the weight of all graded tests, evaluations, and examinations held in an entire semester.
